Urgent position of Senior Project Manager within the Investment Management Platform program
Work Location: Remote (Needed profiles from only EST, Need to work on EST Time Zone)
Job Description:
Senior Project Manager leading workstreams (eg. Market Data and Data workstream) within the Investment Management Platform program
What will the Senior Project Manager be responsible for?
∙Lead large-scale, high impact workstreams within the Investment Management Platform Program on behalf of Franklin Templeton
∙This will generally involve multiple business units & functions within the enterprise, with moderate to high risk and complexity including Investment Management, Back Office Operations, Service and Operations, Sales, Marketing, Infrastructure Services, etc.
∙Acting as a single point of accountability to plan, direct, and coordinate assigned workstreams to ensure goals and objectives are achieved with high quality and delivering on expected business value.
∙Responsibility will include working with team members from within the Enterprise & vendors and working with team members from many locations around the world
∙Ability to drive to rigid timelines and results for assigned workstream based off larger program milestones
∙Organize, plan, track, document, and own take aways for a meetings and to do for workflow.
∙Take high level topics/decisions and break them down into smaller pieces and self-initiate next steps on how to take decisions forward in a timely basis
What would help someone be successful in this role?
∙Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent experience
∙Min 8-12 years related Project Management / Leadership experience
∙Investment Management / Front Office operations experience
∙Experience working in a large-scale multi-national firm essential; Financial Services industry a plus.
∙Exceptional communication and organizational skills
∙Experience with investment management technology/process transformation (ie. Aladdin, Charles river, SimCorp)
Tasks
∙Co-ordinate the Risk Market Data working group that is part of the overall Risk workstream on the IM Platform Program
∙Drive actions, resolve issues, tracks follow ups, raise risks, coordinates/documents decisions related to assigned worksteams
∙Co-ordinate weekly meetings with core Risk team and ad-hoc meetings with Front Office teams and Operations teams
